short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts selected timestamp to local date and time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension helps to display the timestamp in a readable format in the context menu (like "right mouse button"-menu). Just select the timestamp and open the context menu.
